description.value:
The shaman can invoke an ancestor spirit into an intact, humanoid or monstrous humanoid corpse to learn what the body knew in life. The acts as @Compendium[pf1.spells.byn5q46du0ck592a]{Speak with Dead}, but the shaman may ask only a single question. If an animated corpse or undead is targeted with this ability, the hex immediately fails.

Once a corpse has answered a single question, it cannot be targeted with this ability again.
